title: Letter from President Donald J. Trump to the Speaker of the House of Representatives Nancy Pelosi â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
January 28, 2019
The Honorable Nancy Pelosi
Speaker of the House of Representatives
Washington, D.C. 20515Dear Madam Speaker:Thank you for your letter inviting me to deliver the State of the Union Address before ajoint session of Congress on Tuesday, February 5, 2019. It is my great honor to accept. We have a great story to tell and yet, great goals to achieve!I look forward to seeing you on the 5th.Sincerely,Donald J. Trump
